title: Bolt
description: Bolt is stronger, faster, and more powerful, unlike any other dog. He and Penny are on the mission.
altHero: Bolt the dog in a chamber with bolts of electricty all around
alt1: Penny holds a pair of binoculars to Bolt’s eyes as he growls
alt2: an evil-looking man in the reflection of another man’s glasses
alt3: Bolt holds a car with his mouth from falling off a bridge
alt4: Bolt shoots lasers from his eyes
